title: Corn harvester right in the field the daily life of farmers #farm #dailylife harvester

tasks.task: Drive a combine harvester
subtasks: Sit in the operator seat
Monitor the harvest progress
Adjust the combine settings as needed
Collect crops into the combine's bin
Drive the combine to the field

tasks.task: Load the combine bin with crops
subtasks: Check the bin's capacity
Utilize controls to tip the bin
Position the bin over the truck bed
Empty the bin into the truck bed

tasks.task: Unload the combine bin onto a truck
subtasks: Attach the bin to the truck
Lift the bin using the truck's tailgate
Transfer the crops from the bin into the truck bed
Secure the crops in the truck bed

tasks.task: Drive a tractor equipped with a forklift
subtasks: Position the forklift attachment
Operate the forklift to load crops
Drive the tractor to the desired location

tasks.task: Conduct a field inspection on foot
subtasks: Walk through the harvested field
Check for any missed crops
Assess the ground condition
Look for signs of pest or disease

tasks.task: Operate a self-propelled forage harvester
subtasks: Monitor the harvesting process
Adjust the cutting height
Ensure proper loading of crops into the truck

tasks.task: Handle crops with a forklift
subtasks: Load crops onto a trailer
Secure the crops in the trailer
Transport the crops to the storage facility

tasks.task: Operate a grain auger
subtasks: Position the auger under the truck bed
Connect the auger to the grain unloading line
Transfer crops from the truck to the storage bin

tasks.task: Drive a pickup truck for transporting equipment
subtasks: Load tools and equipment onto the truck
Secure items to prevent movement
Drive to the farm for maintenance tasks

tasks.task: Operate a loader tractor for stacking hay
subtasks: Attach the loader arm
Pick up hay bales from the field
Stack the bales onto the trailer
Transport the bales to the storage yard

tasks.task: Cultivate soil using a tractor and cultivator
subtasks: Attach the cultivator tool
Drive the tractor over the field
Set depth and pass spacing
Monitor soil condition during cultivation

tasks.task: Plant crops with a row crop planter
subtasks: Assemble the planter on the tractor
Adjust row spacing and depth settings
Plant seeds into the prepared soil
Monitor the planting progress

tasks.task: Operate a water sprinkler system
subtasks: Hook up the sprinkler to the water source
Check valves and connections
Start the sprinkler system and adjust coverage
Monitor water sprinkling duration

tasks.task: Load and unload equipment between locations
subtasks: Move a combine from the field to the storage area
Transfer sprayers between the barn and the fields
Transport a plow to various fields as needed

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer by spreading
subtasks: Set up the fertilizer spreader on the tractor
Distribute the fertilizer evenly across the field
Monitor spread width and application rate

tasks.task: Milk a cow using a milking machine
subtasks: Attach the milking cups to the cow's teats
Start the milking process
Collect the milk into the machine's container
Disconnect the milking cups after completion

tasks.task: Hagglute a cow during milking
subtasks: Position the hagglute (milking machine) under the cow
Start the milking machine
Connect the milk line to the cooling system
Monitor milk flow and quality

tasks.task: Bleed a cow manually after milking
subtasks: Locate and puncture the uterine vein
Collect the milk from the vein
Ensure proper bleeding to improve udder health

tasks.task: Milk a cow with two Teats
subtasks: Attach two teat cups to the cow’s teats
Start the milking machine
Collect the milk from the teats
Monitor milk flow from both teats

tasks.task: Milk a cow using a three-phase milking method
subtasks: Position the milking cups for the three phases
Sequence the milk withdrawal phases
Attach three teat cups if applicable
Start milking in the three-phase sequence

tasks.task: Interact with a bull during breeding
subtasks: Position the bull for breeding with a cow
Supervise the natural mating process
Check the bull's health and performance
Ensure proper breeding technique

tasks.task: Drive a combine harvester equipped with a header
subtasks: Operate the header for cutting crops
Adjust header settings for different crops
Monitor header operation during cutting

tasks.task: Escape a corn snake encounter
subtasks: Avoid stepping on the snake
If encountered, cautiously move away without provoking

tasks.task: Operate a grain drill for direct seeding
subtasks: Assemble the grain drill on the tractor
Adjust residue covers and down pressure wheels
Plant seeds at the desired depth and spacing
Monitor planting furrows for straightness

tasks.task: Conduct livestock inspections
subtasks: Check livestock for signs of illness
Feeder for animals
Clean stalls or pens
Ensure adequate water supply for livestock

tasks.task: Drive a manure spreader attached to a tractor
subtasks: Load manure onto the spreader
Adjust spreader settings for application
Drive the tractor over the fields to spread the manure

tasks.task: Install irrigation pipes for crop watering
subtasks: Lay out the irrigation pipe in the field
Secure the pipes to avoid movement
Connect the pipe to the water source
Start the irrigation system and monitor flow

tasks.task: Drive a tractor with a rotary cutter for residue management
subtasks: Position the rotary cutter attachment
Adjust the cutting depth
Drive the tractor over the field to cut residue
Ensure even residue coverage

tasks.task: Apply pesticides by spraying
subtasks: Attach the pesticide sprayer to the tractor
Calibrate the spray nozzles for coverage
Drive the tractor over the field while spraying
Monitor spray coverage and drift

tasks.task: Manure handling with a skid-steer loader
subtasks: Attach the loader bucket to the skid-steer
Load manure into the bucket
Transport the manure to the storage area
Unload manure into the manure storage

tasks.task: Handle and stack hay bales with a skid-steer loader
subtasks: Attach a叉prong to the skid-steer loader
Lift hay bales from the field
Stack the bales onto a trailer
Secure the bales for transport to the barn

tasks.task: Operate a forage harvester for chopping hay
subtasks: Attach the chopper head to the harvester
Set the chopping length
Harvest the hay and chop it into the desired length
Direct the chopped forage into the hay wagon or storage

tasks.task: Collect eggs from chickens
subtasks: Open the chicken coop doors
Gently pick up eggs from the nesting boxes
Handle eggs carefully to avoid cracking
Place eggs into a collection basket

tasks.task: Conduct veterinary checks on livestock
subtasks: Examine animals for any injuries or health issues
Administer vaccinations or treatments as needed
Record health observations and treatments
Ensure proper hygiene and sanitation

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer through injection into the soil
subtasks: Attach the fertilizer injection equipment to the tractor
Drive the tractor over the field while injecting the fertilizer
Control the injection depth and rate
Monitor the application uniformity

tasks.task: Collect data on crop yields
subtasks: Use a yield monitor attached to the combine
Record harvested amounts as the combine operates
Analyze the data for yield mapping
Use the data for future crop management decisions

tasks.task: Apply pesticide using an aerial application
subtasks: Load the pesticide onto an airplane
Pilot the aircraft over crop fields for spraying
Adjust flight patterns for uniform coverage
Monitor the spray application from the air

tasks.task: Milk a cow twice daily
subtasks: Perform morning milking
Perform evening milking
Clean teats and equipment between milkings
Collect and cool the milk for storage

tasks.task: Operate a manure spreader for applying after chopping
subtasks: Set the spreader to relay mode
Drive the spreader over the chipped manure for spreading
Ensure even distribution and manage overspill
Turn right half of the spread area

tasks.task: Load a wag willow
subtasks: Place logs into the wagon's trailer
Secure the load to prevent shifting
Transport the logs to the storage or processing area

tasks.task: Conduct a field test of new equipment
subtasks: Set up the new piece of agricultural equipment
Test the equipment in the field
Monitor performance and troubleshoot issues
Document test results for evaluation

tasks.task: Operate a plant protection machine
subtasks: Prepare the machine with the appropriate pesticide
Drive the machine through the crops to apply the chemicals
Adjust the machine's speed and coverage
Check application uniformity and coverage

tasks.task: Collect soil samples for testing
subtasks: Use a soil sampling probe or auger
Collect samples from different field locations
Documentation of sample positions and depth
Seal the samples and send them for analysis

tasks.task: Operate a self-propelled forage harvester for silage
subtasks: Adjust the cutter bar height for the silage
Haul the cut silage to the storage pit or bunker
Use the harvester to roll and pack the silage
Monitor the fermentation process for silage quality

tasks.task: Pick fallen apples from the ground
subtasks: Gently lift apples from under the tree
Sort through the apples for damage
Place undamaged apples in a collection basket

tasks.task: Manual harvest of small crops
subtasks: Bend down to pick individual plants or heads
Lift the harvested plants into a basket or sack
Transport the full baskets to the collection area

tasks.task: Drive a wagon equipped with a grain elevator
subtasks: Load the wagon with crops at the field
Position the elevator to unload the grain into the wagon
Secure the grain in the wagon for transport

tasks.task: Operate a tow-behind multi-ram mower
subtasks: Attach the mower to the tractor
Set the cutting height and mulch or bagging options
Mow the grass or plants in the field
Collect the clippings using the bagging feature if necessary

tasks.task: Apply pesticide using herbicide boom sprayers
subtasks: Connect the herbicide tank to the tractor
Attach the boom sprayer to the tractor
Drive the tractor over the field, applying the herbicide
Monitor spray patterns and coverage

tasks.task: Operate a forklift to move hay bales
subtasks: Attach the forklift tines to the hay bale
Lift the bale and move it to the stacking area
Stack the bales neatly on the trailer
Used to load bales onto a trucks or to store

tasks.task: Use a mattock or grubber to dig post holes
subtasks: Hold the mattock or grubber correctly
Drive the tool into the ground to create holes
Remove soil from the holes as needed

tasks.task: Adjust a pick-up on the grain wagon
subtasks: Check the pick-up's angle and position
Ensure the pickup is secure and functioning
Adjust the height for different grain types

tasks.task: Operate a grain auger for unloading into a storage bin
subtasks: Position the auger underneath the wagon or truck
Connect the auger to the grain outlet
Start the auger and control the flow rate
Monitor the unloading process and shut off if necessary

tasks.task: Cultivate the soil for cover crop planting
subtasks: Haul a cover crop seed spreader to the field
Calibrate the spreader for proper seed rate
Drive the tractor over the field with the spreader
Drag a cultivator behind the tractor to prepare the soil

tasks.task: Harvest honey from beehives
subtasks: Wear protective gear when opening hives
Remove honey supers from the frame
Extract honey from the supers using an extractor
Filter the honey to remove excess wax and debris

tasks.task: Use a backhoe for on-farm construction or digging
subtasks: Start the engine and prepare the backhoe for operation
Excavate soil or other materials as required
Assist in the construction of farm structures
Load soil into trucks or spread around the field

tasks.task: Spaghetti a specialized combine operation
subtasks: Attach a stripper header to the combine
Adjust stripper settings for optimal feeding
Monitor straw handling and disposal during harvest

tasks.task: Handle sheep shearing
subtasks: Restrain a sheep for shearing
Use shears to remove the wool in a controlled manner
Sort the sheep's wool into clean piles
Clean any fleeces that fall to maintain quality

tasks.task: Inspect and adjust irrigation systems
subtasks: Check sprinklers and emitters for leaks
Align the sprinkler heads and nozzles
Verify uniform water distribution across the field
Upgrade or repair parts as needed

tasks.task: Apply top soil to fields
subtasks: Mix the topsoil with existing soil in the field
Spread the topsoil evenly using a rotv tillage machine
Evaluate the topsoil's suitability for planting
Aerate the soil if necessary to improve drainage

tasks.task: Operate a fertilizer spreader for top-dressing
subtasks: Attach the spreader to the tractor
Adjust the spreader to the desired setting for fertilizer type
Drive the spreader across the fields
Monitor the spreading pattern for even coverage

tasks.task: Conduct a soil test on crops to check nutrient levels
subtasks: Collect plant samples from different fields
Transport the samples to a laboratory for analysis
Interpret the test results to guide fertilization
Adjust farm practices based on nutrient deficiencies

tasks.task: Work with a dog to herd livestock
subtasks: Guide the livestock to the designated milking or handling area
Use commands or body language to assist the dog
Ensure the safety of the livestock during handling
Evaluate the effectiveness of the dog in herding

tasks.task: Water livestock using a trough
subtasks: Fill the water trough with fresh water
Ensure the nozzle is not clogged, providing proper flow
Clean the water trough to maintain hygiene
Check the water pressure and system integrity

tasks.task: Use a trail or four wheeler for farm patrols
subtasks: Drive the vehicle around the farm property
Check fences, gates, and irrigation systems
Tackle is to gather the latest information on weather conditions
Look for any signs of vandalism or issues with equipment

subtasks: Load the cow onto an automatic milking carousel
Select the milking stations for the cow
Observe the milking process through the control panel

subtasks: Use rectal palpation to check for pregnancy

The transcript is about performing physical tasks related to farming and agriculture, so the provided list of tasks is relevant. Each main task (listed with 'MAINTASK') and their sub-tasks (listed with 'SUBTASK') are directly related to agricultural activities such as driving combines, handling crops, milking cows, applying fertilizers, and operating machinery. These tasks reflect the physical labor involved in farm work, making the list appropriate and detailed.
